General.Name: Nylex (Malaysia) Bhd
General.Description: Nylex (Malaysia) Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in manufacture, trade, and sale of petrochemicals and industrial chemical products. The company operates through Polymer, Industrial Chemical, and Logistics segments. The Polymer segment manufactures and markets polyurethane and vinyl-coated fabrics, rotomoulded plastic products, calendered film and sheeting, and other plastic products, including geotextiles and prefabricated sub-soil drainage systems, bulk chemical containers, road barriers, playground equipment, and disposal bins. The Industrial Chemical segment markets and distributes petrochemicals and industrial chemicals. The Logistics segment engages in the business of transport, cartage and haulage contractors and agencies, ship owning, ship management and charter hire of tanker. In addition, the company manufactures and sells phosphoric acid, PU and PVC leathercloth, sealants, ethanol, carbon dioxide, and other chemical products; engages in property development business; and trading and distribution of industrial chemicals and gasoline blending components. It operates in Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, and Vietnam. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Nylex (Malaysia) Berhad operates as a subsidiary of Ancom Nylex Berhad.
